bibl.title: Notes on Papyri
bibl.note: Continued from: BASP 54 (2017) pp. 255-260. - Two Notes on Greek Liturgical Texts from Egypt [P. Barc. Inv. 157b (= van Haelst 864; LDAB 552), 12; P. Ryl. I, 7 (= van Haelst 973; LDAB 6298), 14] (Peter van Minnen). - P. Bingen 45 Revisited (Peter van Minnen). - Κόροι, σάτα, and κάβοι in P. Mur. 97 (Michaël Girardin). - Two Accounts with "Minus Carats" Figures [P. Daris 41; P. Princ. III, 139] (Nikolaos Gonis). - P. Iand. Inv. 660 [= S.B. XIV, 12098]: Another "Curious Prescript" (Nikolaos Gonis). - P.Oxy. 18.2195 (Susan Fogarty & Nikolaos Gonis).
bibl.seg: 145.4 P. Bingen 45 P. Daris 41 P. Iand. Inv. 660 P. Mur. 97 P. Oxy. XVIII, 2195 P. Princ. III, 139
